stories.text: I’m thinking about starting a new blog to be hosted on GitHub pages. I’ve been out of the blog game for a while and a lot of the old static site frameworks seem like they haven’t been updated in a while. What tools are other people using for their technical blogs?
stories.title: Ask HN: What blogging framework to use in 2022
The Promise of Open Source EDA Software

stories.text:
When I search for ways to improve memory there are plenty of articles to do basics like exercise, eat well, get lots of sleep. Assuming you're already doing those things are there other ways to improve your memory and recall?

Ideally I would love to be able to easily recall something I read from a book, or easily recall something someone told me in a conversation.
stories.title: Ask HN: Is it possible to train and improve your memory and recall?
Four Tests for Choosing a Cofounder
The Fall of Ubuntu as a Gaming Distro
CPI Inflation Rate Is Finally Falling but Not Enough; Dow Jones Rises

stories.text: There are lot of speculations around economic crisis given tech stocks are in down fall and some companies started talking about reduced hiring ( FB, Uber).
stories.title: Ask HN: What do HN users feel about the downfall of Tech stocks?
Starlink Scrambled to Keep Ukraine Online
The unreasonable effectiveness of data-oriented programming
